CustomField.formula: AND( Account_Record_Type__c = 'partner', Account.Is_Active_CC_Partner__c = true, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.status__c, 'Discarded')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Account.status__c, 'Graveyard')), OR( ISBLANK(Account.PartnerPaymentBank__c), ISBLANK(Account.PartnerPaymentIBAN__c), ISBLANK(Account.Credit_Note_Recipient_Name__c), ISBLANK(Account.vat_number__c), ISBLANK(Account.BillingCity), ISBLANK(Account.BillingCountry), ISBLANK(Account.BillingPostalCode), ISBLANK(Account.BillingStreet)))
CustomField.label: Agency Information Incomplete
